title.en: One Strike God-Annihilating Holy Maiden ~The Holy Maiden continues her legend after 5000 Years of sleep~

altTitles.en: Ni no Uchi Irazu no Shin Metsu Seijo ~5000 Nen Go ni Mezameta Seijo ha, Saikyou no Tsuzuki wo suru koto ni shita~
Ni no Uchi Irazu no Shin Metsu Seijo ~Go Sen Nen Go ni Mezameta Seijo ha, Saikyou no Tsuzuki wo suru koto ni shita~
Ni no Uchi Irazu no Shinmetsu Seijo - Gosen Nengo ni Mezameta Seijo ha, Saikyou no Tsudzuki wo Suru Koto ni Shita
One Strike God-Annihilating Holy Maiden ~The Holy Maiden continues her legend after 5000 Years of sleep~
The God-Destroying Holy Maiden who doesn't need to strike twice ~The Holy Maiden who woke up 5000 years later chose to continue being the strongest~
二の打ち要らずの神滅聖女 ~五千年後に目覚めた聖女は、最強の続きをすることにした~

description.en:
Saint Nilma. The hero who butt into the Great God Annihilation War between the gods and slayed all opposition. However, due to the Great War, humanity is all but extinct, and so she chose to sleep in the hopes that humanity will be able to rebuild in the future. Fast-forward 5000 years later: Nilma has awoken but the world is a very different place! Aggressors are invading from Another World, "adventurer" is now a job, and clergy-people are ridiculed for only being able to use shobby Recovery Magic. This story is about how the strongest, invincible Holy Maiden makes her name known as the strongest once again in this world that has changed so much it might as well be another world!  
  
(source: <https://futabanet.jp/list/monster/work/5e046f657765615b0e000000>)
